so once i get to the console thing.. How would i shut down the program that is frozen?
first you need to know its process PID by listing all running process using "ps" , then kill it using kill <pid>
if the currently running processes are many using grep is a good idea, "ps | grep rhythmbox" ◀▬▬  that who list only rhythmbox
